name: places/ChIJIeCpQAVZwokR6H15yinGTEY
adrFormatAddress: 501 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016-4857, USA

originalText.text: Brand new building and they have been working hard to fix any problems. Great location, safe and helpful/friendly staff. Agree the shower design was not good and we replaced with shower doors. Rooftop is amazing and gym is great for me. So far we are very happy here.

text.text: Brand new building and they have been working hard to fix any problems. Great location, safe and helpful/friendly staff. Agree the shower design was not good and we replaced with shower doors. Rooftop is amazing and gym is great for me. So far we are very happy here.

originalText.text:
New building, extremely friendly and professional concierge, great communication and promptness from management. Great appliances but iffy build job (my unit flooring is not completely level). Great rooftop.

Extremely poorly designed showers, water just goes all over the floor. Gym just opened and it is useless; no weights, squat rack, etc. despite being promised such in showings.
